title: 08/18 Fantasy Football Podcast: Wide Receivers Preview Part 2
description:
Best chance to be a Top 10 WR (2:15): Martavis Bryant, Kelvin Benjamin or Tyreek Hill? Favorite mid-round pick (9:15): Brandon Marshall, Devante Parker or DeSean Jackson? ... Reactions to the latest news and some preseason action (14:34) before we dive into ADP beginning in Round 3 and ending about 50 WRs later ... What to expect from the NE WRs (21:00), Alshon Jeffery's pros and cons (26:35), Keenan Allen's positive reports, plus so many WRs outside the Top 24 we have huge hopes for and players to draft in the very late rounds (58:10) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
